title: The Ultimate Thrill Skydiving
brief_description: Experience the ultimate thrill of skydiving in this incredible video that gives you an inside look at this unique sport. View all aspects of skydiving from preparation, jumping and freefall, to stunts and landings with detailed photography that allows you to see all the action. Filmed from a skydiver’s perspective, experience the panoramic views only possible through this sport. In addition to giving you an educational and interesting look at this remarkable sport, you will also be entertained by the fast-paced action.
